entry.title: Missing Child Dane Paulsen Found Deceased in Siletz River
entry.summary: Missing child Dane Paulsen, who vanished on March 1, was found deceased in the Siletz River, three miles downstream from his family's property. Authorities and volunteers conducted an extensive search before the discovery. The Lincoln County Sheriff’s Office asks for privacy as the family grieves.

entry.title: Fatal Structure Fire in Winston Under Investigation
entry.summary: "One person died in a structure fire in Winston on Tuesday morning. Fire crews arrived to find heavy smoke and flames in the living room. entry.title: Wolf Creek Man Arrested for Manslaughter After Fatal Crash in Glendale
entry.summary: A Wolf Creek man was arrested for second-degree manslaughter after a Glendale crash killed his 11-year-old daughter. The vehicle rolled down an embankment, ejecting three juveniles. Authorities say driver impairment was a factor. The driver fled but later returned and was arrested.
